title: An advice on ganking under tower?
body:
Hey all, 
Just finished a match after about 30 mins or so (I think O.o), and I'd like to know if there is any way of helping the team if they've pushed the enemy champs underneath their towers?

**[Story Time]**
Pretty much, I rushed both buffs down - hadn't used any potions + lvl 3 - and went searching for gank oppurtunities...
Every lane was pushed into tower -> I ran in and chucked a Shiv at mid lane Jayce (under tower), then ran off.
Later on (2 min), top lane Luc accuses me of racism ("u usles sh4co") when ShrekSai tears him a new one.
 
Further later... several other team mates accuse me of not ganking enough (they never seemed to get off the enemy tower). 
And yet I probably outclassed 1/2 of the team in assists (from what I remember from 10mins ago).

*This behind, any jungler strats to kill people under tower? *

Cheers

replies.body: As a jungler like shaco it is not really smart to attempt a tower dive at lvl 3, he does not do enough damage early for you or your team mate to get out safely with out giving away a free kill. If you use someone like pantheon it will be easy As he has good amount of chunk damage early and his passive to consume the first tower hit. You really want to look at your laners damage cap and cc if you are to pull of a nice lvl 3 tower dive and you most likely have to flash out to save yourself.
I figured it'd be like that for Shac. I have been trying some Pantheon though.. might give it a crack.
If its top lane you can come in from behind and sneak into the bushes on the edge without the enemy noticing, then wait for the enemy to push up a bit then go in and should be easy kill.

Hawk,
Like a tower dive scenario?
I want to give that a shot, but I'm a bit worried about if the turret kills us accidentally :S

I mean moving up to the bushes on the edge, then just wait for the enemy to push a bit further,closer towards you, then you come out and kill the enemy. So it doesn't involve tower diving. If it's successful the enemy won't know you are there and should be easy kill.

Hey there Rpd HMNCentipede,

A couple ideas but don't take my word on them.

1. You could try generating vision and gank protection. You could place your boxes in common opposing gank routes.
2. If a lane is pushed up. Depending on the situation they are in you can join the lane and push the turret.

Awesome! I feel like an idiot for not remembering that !_!
Cheers LOLS !!
